snippet: BEARDSLEY--Charles W.,of New York City and Maine, died May 3. Survived by daughter Janet and brother Rick. Memorial to be announced. In lieu of flowers, donations to: www.tudorcitygreens.org 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BEARDSLEY, CHARLES W.
